repository_map.summary: Mapping of Git repositories in the workspace, classified by Subject and Object.

definitions.subject_repository: Contains actual, versioned content; a 'working' repository where development happens.
definitions.object_repository: Acts as a container or 'passthrough' for other repositories, ignoring their subdirectories via .gitignore; essentially 'holds' other repositories without managing their content directly.

repositories.description: Repository for chat logs and related communication data.
Repository for user-specific configuration files (dotfiles).
The main Gemini repository, containing the agent's core code and configuration.
